name: The Legend of Zelda: Sands of Time
storyline:
Long long ago. After exterminating all those who are a threat to the Evil King, the tyrant, Ganon, rule over the Hyrule. Abusing all the 3 Triforces he held, he turned Hyrule into lifeless earth.

Despite his position as a mortal god, he's still a slave to the mortal death. When the inevitable day came,the tyrant, Ganon, died for old age. The Dark Age was over. Overturning the old reign of terror, survivors build their own rule on ruin.

Some of them started a new life, searching for the fortune left behind by Ganon... A young adventurer, dreaming of sucess, risking his life, sets out on his path...
summary: Zelda: Sands of Time is a ROM hack of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time (64). It features new worlds, power ups, enemies, story, quality of life improvements and more.
